content:
Action:4

I'm moving up from row2,col6 to row1,col6 to start approaching the box at row4,col3 and eventually push it down into the hole at row6,col3.

Action:1

I'm moving the avatar one step left to begin navigating toward the box at (4,3), with the plan of pushing it down toward the hole at (6,3); I expect this to start our planned path without any rotation issues.

Action:1

I'm moving left from (1,5) to (1,4) so that I can navigate toward positioning above the box at (4,3) to later push it toward the hole at (6,3).

Action:1

I'm moving the avatar left from (1,4) to (1,3) (a hole tile, but still accessible) to begin approaching the box at (4,3) from above, so I can eventually push it downward into the hole.

Action:3

I'm moving down from row1, col3 to row2, col3 so I can eventually get behind the box at row4, col3 and push it towards the hole at row6, col3.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down from (2,3) to (3,3) to approach the box at (4,3) so that I can later push it toward the hole at (6,3), following our plan.

Action:3

I'm pushing downward from (3,3) to move the box at (4,3) towards the hole at (6,3), anticipating that the box will shift to (5,3) and can then be pushed further down on the next move.

Action:3

I’m pushing down from (4,3) to move the box at (5,3) into the hole at (6,3), which should remove that box and score a point as per the game rules.

Action:4

I'm moving UP from (5,3) to (4,3) to start maneuvering toward the right side of the box, positioning myself so I can eventually push it toward the hole.

Action:3

I'm moving down from (4,3) to start navigating around so I can eventually get behind the box at (2,5) and push it left, which will lead it into the hole at (1,3).

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar up from (5,3) to (4,3) to begin navigating around toward a position (likely above or right of the box) that will allow me to push the box into one of the holes. I expect this move to shift my position, setting me up for the needed approach.

Action:4

I move up from (4,3) to (3,3) in order to navigate around obstacles and position myself for pushing the box toward the hole.

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar upward from (3,3) to (2,3) to start the path toward reaching the pushing position at (2,6), which will allow me to push the box left into a hole.

Action:2

I'm moving right from (2,3) to (2,4) so I can begin repositioning around the box and eventually push it left toward the hole, following the planned strategy.

Action:4

I'm moving the avatar up from (2,4) to (1,4) to begin navigating around the box so I can eventually get to its right side and push it left toward the nearby hole at (1,3).

Action:2

I'm moving right so that I can head towards (1,6) and eventually reach (2,6) behind the box, setting up a push to move the box left toward the hole.

Action:2

I'm moving right so that I can later navigate beneath the box to push it left toward a hole. I expect my avatar to move from (1,5) to (1,6) as planned.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down from (1,6) to (2,6) so that it positions itself to the right of the box at (2,5); next, I plan to push the box left toward the nearby hole.

Action:1

I'm pushing left so the avatar (starting at row2, col6) pushes the box from (2, col5) to (2, col4), setting up for a subsequent push upward into the hole.

Action:1
I'm pushing left to move the box from (2,4) toward (2,3), which will align it one step closer to the hole at (1,3) and set up for the next push.

Action:3

I'm moving the avatar down from (2,4) to (3,4), which positions me to get behind the box so that I can later push it upward into the hole at (1,3).

Action:1

I'm moving left to position behind the box, aiming to get under it so I can push it upward into the hole.

Action:4

I'm pushing upward to move the box into the nearby hole, expecting that the box will be removed and the level cleared.
